Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We report a case of acute renal failure after HD - MTX therapy in a patient with ileostomy , The patient was a 3 - year - old boy who had received a living - related liver transplantation for congenital biliary atresia .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| acute renal failure |
| HD - MTX therapy |
| congenital biliary atresia |
| living-related liver transplantation |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |

| congenital biliary atresia |

The term "HD - MTX therapy" is not a disease, but a treatment (Hemodialysis and Methotrexate therapy).

Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We report a case of acute renal failure after HD - MTX therapy in a patient with ileostomy , The patient was a 3 - year - old boy who had received a living - related liver transplantation for congenital biliary atresia .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| HD (Hemodialysis) |
| MTX (Methotrexate) |
| congenital biliary atresia |

Note: "acute renal failure" is a clinical condition and not a chemical entity. "living-related liver transplantation" is a medical procedure and not a chemical entity. "patient" and "boy" are not chemical entities. "three-year-old" is a descriptive term and not a chemical entity.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| MTX (Methotrexate) |

Note: "HD (Hemodialysis)" is a medical procedure and not a chemical entity. "patient with ileostomy" and "three-year-old boy" are not chemical entities. "who had received a living-related liver transplantation for congenital biliary atresia" is a descriptive phrase and not a chemical entity.
